ing: 1 (29 ounce) can yams, drained and mashed
1 cup sugar frosted corn flake cereal
des: "My entire family has always hated yams until I made this dish 15 years ago.  Now everyone looks forward to this dish during the holidays.  However, I do make it at home during the year, not just during the holidays.  I have given this recipe to several people that have requested it, now I'll give it to you."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a large bowl combine yams, melted butter, white sugar, evaporated milk, eggs, nutmeg, cinnamon and vanilla extract.  Mix well and transfer to a 9x9 inch casserole dish.
In a medium bowl cream butter with brown sugar.  Stir in walnuts and frosted cereal.  Spread on top of yam mixture.
Bake in preheated oven for 35 minutes.
